title: Work in the Covid-19 Era: What the Numbers Say About Vaccine Mandates, Quitting and More
sub_head: Job frustrations, work-safety worries, delayed office reopenings—this isn’t the post-pandemic season we were hoping for
body: This month was supposed to mark the triumphant return to the office, to business travel, to non-wobbly child care and a postwork happy hour or two.
